dashboard.no_jobs: No jobs yet. Create your first scraping job!

credits.title: Credits
credits.subtitle: Purchase credits to run scraping jobs

landing.subtitle: Social Data Intelligence Platform
landing.hero_desc: Paste a Facebook post URL and extract structured profile data for every commenter — names, demographics, education, work history, and 18+ fields. Export as CSV or Facebook Ads custom audience format.
landing.features_desc: Powerful tools for marketers, researchers, and data teams who need social media data at scale.
landing.pricing_desc: Buy credits, use when you need. No subscriptions, no recurring charges.
landing.pricing_note: 1 credit = 1 profile extracted with all 18 data fields.
landing.cta_desc: Join marketers and researchers using SocyBase to turn social media into actionable data.
landing.step_1_desc: Sign up in seconds with email or Google. Get a workspace with credit balance tracking, job history, and team access. No credit card required.
landing.step_2_desc: Paste a Facebook post URL or upload a list of profile IDs. Choose your target platform and click extract. Track progress in real-time.
landing.step_3_desc: Get a structured CSV with 18 normalized fields per profile. Or export as Facebook Ads custom audience format for instant retargeting.
landing.fields_body: Every profile comes back with the same 18 normalized fields: full name, gender, birthday, relationship status, education, work, position, hometown, current city, website, languages, username, profile link, and more. No manual parsing or cleanup needed.
landing.profile_extraction_desc: Extract 18+ structured fields — name, education, work, location, and more from public profiles automatically.
landing.comment_scraping_desc: Collect comments with commenter details, timestamps, and full text. Perfect for audience research and sentiment analysis.
landing.bulk_processing_desc: Upload thousands of profile URLs or user IDs. Process them all in a single job with live progress tracking.
landing.export_anywhere_desc: Download as CSV or Facebook Ads custom audience format. Ready for your CRM, ad platform, or analytics pipeline.
